name: Jake Halliwell
story: Jake Halliwell grew up in a small town in England. He joined the British Army when he turned 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional marksmanship and leadership abilities. Jake is now a Corporal and leads his squad with courage and determination. He is a Grenadier and carries a M203 grenade launcher as his primary weapon. Despite facing many obstacles and dangers in his career, Jake remains committed to serving his country and his fellow soldiers.
